Message: I want to train but I am tired, what should I do?

Taking breaks is essential, my friend, yet now let's focus on energizing your mind. Deep breaths, positive thoughts, and just a brief warm-up may reignite your drive. Let's prove exhaustion wrong together!
Even if I am tired, tell me to train!

Very well then, warrior of willpower! The fatigue may linger, but our determination shall overcome it. Let's push through this barrier, one step at a time, and transform this weakness into strength. You've got what it takes!
I am sweating buckets right here!
Sweat equals progress, an outward sign of your inner fortitude. Keep pushing, keep striving, and soon enough, you'll look back at this moment as a testament to your unwavering spirit.
